## PULSE data

```{r}
pulse_df=
  haven::read_sas("data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  pivot_longer(
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m,
    names_to="visit",
    values_to="bdi_score",
    names_prefix="bdi_score_"
  ) |>
  mutate(
    visit = replace(visit,visit=="bl", "00m")
  )

pulse_df
```

## Learning Assessment

```{r}
litters_df=
  read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv") |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  select(litter_number, gd0_weight, gd18_weight) |>
  pivot_longer(
    gd0_weight:gd18_weight,
    names_to = "gd",
    values_to = "weight",
    names_prefix = "gd"
  ) |>
  mutate(
    gd = case_match(
      gd,
      "0_weight" ~ 0,
      "18_weight" ~ 18,
    )
  )
```
